products.name: Original Pork Tocino
products.description: The product which made Pampanga’s Best known not just in Pampanga but all over the world. This is the first and Original Tocino dated back in 1967.  Indeed, ito ang tamang timpla!

products.name: Boneless Chicken Tocino
products.description: Another first from Pampanga’s Best! Same original Tocino recipe made from 100% premium chicken meat.

products.name: Skinless Longaniza
products.description: A breakfast favorite typically served with eggs and garlic rice.  Dip it in vinegar, to balance that sweet taste it is known for.

products.name: Beef Tapa
products.description: A Filipino version of Beef jerky, this choice cut beef is aged to improve its tenderness.  Having that salty and peppery taste, it is best served with garlic rice and egg.  Prepare this quick meal to satisfy that tapsilog craving.

products.name: Sweet Ham
products.description: Quick, easy and hassle free way of enjoying a good tasting ham.

products.name: Pork Sisig
products.description: A traditional dish that Kapampangans are known for.  Grilled Pork ears and onions with just the right amount of salt, pepper and calamansi makes this dish a staple in every household.

products.name: Tasty Meaty Hotdog with Cheese
products.description: This reddish hotdog is perfect for feeding hungry kids, friends and office mates. Plump and firm to the touch; this delicious hotdog lets out a delectable juice and cheese with every bite.  Take it with mayonnaise, sauerkraut, mustard, catsup or whatever strikes your fancy.

products.name: Pork Barbecue
products.description: A classic Pinoy favorite! Pork meat marinated in Pampanga’s Best special blend of spices that gives it’s delicious sweet and savory taste.

products.name: Pork Barbecue on Stick
products.description: A classic Pinoy favorite on skewers! Pork meat marinated in Pampanga’s Best special blend of spices that gives it’s delicious sweet and savory taste.

products.name: Pork Tapa
products.description: This is the pork version of the tapa. Made from choice pork cuts with a combination of sweet and peppery taste.

products.name: Glizel's Cashew Nuts
products.description: Glizel's Cashew Nuts are a premium quality, delicious and healthy snack option. These cashews are carefully selected and roasted to perfection, enhancing their natural sweet and nutty flavor. They are a rich source of healthy fats, protein, and antioxidants, making them a great snack for those looking to boost their energy levels and support overall health. Glizel's Cashew Nuts are also gluten-free, non-GMO, and vegan, making them suitable for a wide range of dietary preferences. Enjoy them as a snack on their own or add them to your favorite recipes for a crunchy and nutritious boost

products.name: Dried Pusit
products.description: Dried Pusit is a popular chewy, savory snack in the Philippines made from dried and sometimes smoked squid. It is a protein-rich and low-fat snack that can be enjoyed on its own or added to dishes. Common in traditional dishes such as pancit and adobo. Available in Asian markets or online.

products.name: Organic Brown Eggs (1 dozen)
products.description: Organic Brown Eggs are a healthy and delicious food option. These eggs are sourced from chickens raised in a free-range, organic environment, free of pesticides and chemicals. They are higher in Vitamin A, Vitamin E, and Omega-3 fatty acids than conventional eggs. These eggs are also free of antibiotics, hormones, and other harmful chemicals. Perfect for cooking, baking, and a delicious breakfast.

products.name: White Eggs (1 dozen)
products.description: Our Organic White Eggs are a versatile and nutritious food option. These eggs are sourced from chickens raised in a free-range, organic environment, free of pesticides and chemicals. They are a rich source of protein and other essential nutrients, and have a creamy white color. These eggs are perfect for cooking, baking and making a delicious breakfast. They are also free of antibiotics, hormones, and other harmful chemicals. Add them to your cart now and enjoy the taste and health benefits of our organic white eggs.

products.name: Smart Watch
products.description: Custom wallpaper, Bluetooth calling, music control, social APP message reminder, incoming call reminder, SMS reminder, multi-sport, alarm reminder, sedentary reminder, mobile phone search, music playback, stopwatch, step counting, distance, calories, sleep monitoring, Heart rate monitoring, blood pressure, blood oxygen, searching for devices, language switching and raising your hand to light up the screen.

products.name: Fashion Trend Waist Buckle
products.description: The waist buckle, also known as a waist pin, is a fashionable accessory that adds a unique and stylish touch to any outfit. It can be worn on a belt or directly on clothing, cinching in the waist for a flattering silhouette. This versatile accessory can be dressed up or down, making it perfect for any occasion. It is made of high-quality material and comes in a variety of designs, from classic to trendy. Add some edge to your wardrobe with a waist buckle.

products.name: Barley Capsule
products.description: Pure organic, high in fiber, protein, and complex carbohydrates with micronutrients. Has 17 vitamins, 16 minerals, and 18 amino acids, is high in chlorophyll, and enzymes, and is rich in fiber.

products.name: Fusion Coffee
products.description: High in dietary fiber, protein, and complex carbohydrates from organic young barley grass, robusta coffee beans.

products.name: Boost Coffee
products.description: Boost Coffee is a 15-gram mix of Robusta coffee, Tongkat Ali, and organic barley grass powder. It's designed for active people and provides energy and stamina with 78mg of robusta coffee per serving.

products.name: Barley Powder
products.description: Santé Pure Barley in the canister is pure, certified organic young barley grass powder, added with Stevia. The Pure Barley Canister in 200g is perfect for those who want to have more scoops of this superfood in a glass.

products.name: Vitamin C
products.description: Get double the protection and double the health benefits when you take Daily-C Plus 500mg. It’s got the combination of Vitamin C and Zinc that help boost immunity and fight off free radicals, to support overall health and wellness.
